body_html: @apaszke I honestly didn't consider this, because freeze_flags seemed like a generally useful concept that you could use to debug situations where flags were being set when you didn't want them to. Given that we've already setup infrastructure to run arbitrary code when you set these flags, it doesn't seem that complicated.

body: @apaszke I honestly didn't consider this, because `freeze_flags` seemed like a generally useful concept that you could use to debug situations where flags were being set when you didn't want them to. Given that we've already setup infrastructure to run arbitrary code when you set these flags, it doesn't seem that complicated.
